com.hxgraph.graphstrategy

接口 IGraphStrategy<T extends PointCollectionImp>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BarGraphStrategy, BoolGraphStrategy, DotToLineStrategy, GraphStrategyImp, HXKLineStrategy, KLineStrategy, MagicWaveGraphStrategy, RedGreenGraphStrategy, SARGraphStrategy, StockBarGraphStrategy, StockHistroyClosedGraphStrategy, StockWeatherglassGraphStrategy, VolumeGraphStrategy

    public interface IGraphStrategy<T extends PointCollectionImp>
    实际绘制图线的类，根据不同图线的画法 实现不同的绘制策略 Created by liulinru on 2017/4/20.
